dict.acceptation: 抱怨，控诉；委屈，怨言；平平的来由；痛苦根源；

sent.orig: Failure to make a complaint effective usually a result of inadequate presentation of the complaint.
sent.trans: 投诉没有如愿以偿往往是由于所提出的投诉缺乏足够的证据或不够明确。

sent.orig: For instructions on how to file a complaint, please refer to the Trademark Complaint Process page.
sent.trans: 如需关于如何提出申诉，请参阅商标投诉程序的网页。

sent.orig: His complaint makes It'sound like he's interested in justice, doesn't it?
sent.trans: 汤姆这么抱怨，听上去很像他真的在乎事情公正与否，对吧？

sent.orig: The burden of his complaint was that quality was very poor.
sent.trans: 他投诉的要点是品质非常差。

sent.orig: There is no real reason for complaint.
sent.trans: 没有什么可抱怨的理由。
